page.title: 07COMMUNICATION
page.content: Communication is telling someone something. Voice communication:face to face, telephone or C.B.radio. People in our village have meetings to communicate ideas about what we do. We surveyed twenty-five families and discovered that everyone had a telephone. Seven families owned a C.B radio. Most people talk to their friends on the telephone and some people write letters. Businesses use the postal and package services like White Arrow and Securicor, as well as the national service. The government communicates with us by radio and television and we get news by satellite from other countries. Some people use computers to pass information to each other at high speed around the world.
